description: A very young and ambitious boy from a small town paid me a visit today. He was still a student with a graduation exam ahead but he wanted to start working. He wanted a job that would be compatible with his schedule and his school program. He was going to be a graphic designer. And a talented one, I could tell by his lean body and a huge bulge. Honestly, I would give him any position regardless of his qualification just to get this cute little bitch on my table. In the end I had a perfect job for him and the boy didn´t object too much to my offers. He travelled to Prague from far away so he wanted all that effort to be worth it. He grabbed the money I offered him and tried very hard to satisfy me. I´m sure his parents or teachers would be quite surprised what a little devil he was.
title: Dirty Scout 108
